title: Miami, It's Murder
description: Pulitzer Prize-winner Edna Buchanan has seen the dark side of paradise, first-hand. And now she propels her heroine-tough Miami newspaperwoman Britt Montero -- into a steamy suncoast world of lethal sex and sudden death...toward a violent head-on collision with a vengeful rapist who dabbles in the occult.
author: Edna Buchanan
